sys_openapi_operation.name: Get issues for epic
sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation:
{"fName":"Get issues for epic","fOperationId":"getIssuesForEpic","fDescription":"Returns all issues that belong to the epic, for the given epic ID. This only includes issues that the user has permission to view. Issues returned from this resource include Agile fields, like sprint, closedSprints, flagged, and epic. By default, the returned issues are ordered by rank. Note: If you are querying a next-gen project, do not use this operation. Instead, search for issues that belong to an epic by using the Search for issues using JQL operation in the Jira platform REST API. Build your JQL query using the parent clause. For more information on the parent JQL field, see Advanced searching. ","fPath":"/agile/1.0/epic/{epicIdOrKey}/issue","fHttpMethod":"GET","fDeprecated":false,"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"200","fDescription":"Returns the requested issues, at the specified page of the results.","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json"}],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"400","fDescription":"Returned if the request is invalid.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"401","fDescription":"Returned if the user is not logged in.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"403","fDescription":"Returned if the user does not a have valid license.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"404","fDescription":"Returned if the epic does not exist or the user does not have permission to view it.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]}],"fParameters":[{"fName":"epicIdOrKey","fDescription":"The id or key of the epic that contains the requested issues.","fRequired":true,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"path","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"simple","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"epicIdOrKey0923334586","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}}]},{"fName":"startAt","fDescription":"The starting index of the returned issues.
